version_description:
- 新增Touch ID解鎖;
- 修復iPad上app崩潰的bug。

- Support for Live Photos (iOS 9.1+)
- Improve Restore Purchase process

- Support "Select All";
- Bug fixes.

- 修复因支持Live Photo引起的软件崩溃的问题。
- Bug fixes

如果您需要任何帮助，请发送邮件至photovault.info@gmail.com

- Bug fixes and usability enhancement.

If you need any assistance, please feel free to send us mail photovault.info@gmail.com

Please download the version asap if your device has been upgraded to iOS10.
- Support iOS 10
- Fix iOS 10 related bugs
解决iPhone5，iPhone5c，iPhone4s，iPad2无法升级到新版本的问题。
- Bug Fixes.

Good news! PV has updated to new version!
All features are free to use, please enjoy the new trip with us!
- Fresh User Interface and more simple to use;
- Speed up performance for hiding/unhiding photos and videos;
- View photos/videos in landscape mode;
- Add "Recently Delete" function (Trash folder);
- Find back your password via Email;
- Support Touch ID;
- Multiple password locks: Real Passcode + Fake Passcode mode;
- Photo editor;
- Customize photo album cover;
- Bug fixes.

Any problem or suggestion please contact email: photovault.info@gmail.com

Fix critical bugs related with app crashes.

Good news! PV has updated to new version 2.3.4!
All features are free to use, please enjoy the new trip with us!
- Support Slide Show;
- Fresh User Interface and more simple to use;
- Speed up performance for hiding/unhiding photos and videos;
- View photos/videos in landscape mode;

- Provide option to order items by Creation Date;
- Set the slide show background to black;
- Optimize partial user interface;
- Bug fixes.

- Critical Bug Fixes.
Any question/feedback please contact photovault.info@gmail.com.

- Fix crash bugs when entering 4-digit password;
- Performance enhancement.

BTW: Please look forward to next release! New feature preview:
- WiFi transfer feature which allow user to transfer photos/videos between app and PC/Mac. User will be able to select all files by one press then backup then to PC/Mac conveniently.
Welcome to contact us: photovault.info@gmail.com

- Add cloud sync feature: newly support transfer photos/videos between PV and third-party public cloud such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, One Drive
- Obvious UI modification
- Support iPhone X
- Bug fixes and performance enhancement

Any question or suggestion please contact: photovault.info@gmail.com.

1. New feature: Break-in Alert 
- When someone enters an incorrect passcode, we snap a secret photo of the break-in person and log the time.
2. Fix bugs.

Any problem or suggestion, please feel free to contact photovault.info@gmail.com.
- Fix the critical bug for Pro user automatically logout issue.

- Fix the crash bug on iPad;
- Improve the import/export speed;
- Fix Wi-Fi Transfer feature related bugs;
- Improve usability.

- Support using pan gesture to select multiple photos;
- Fix bugs;
- Enhance user experience for some pages.

If you need help or have suggestions, please send email to photovault.info@gmail.com. Thank you!

1. New feature [Nearby Drop] gets online! Do not hesitate to download and join millions users!
- This feature can be used to migrate all the photos to your new iOS device by simple steps, or to share single/multiple photos to your friend nearby;
- Transfer speed for [Nearby Drop] is fast as a flash, and it does NOT consume the network traffic;
Please find this feature in app's [Settings]> [Nearby Drop].

2. Move 'Wi-Fi Transfer' feature from home page menu to Settings;

3. Bug fixes and performance improvement.

Any question or suggestion please contact photovault.ios@gmail.com for support.
- Fix the critical bug for Pro user automatically logout issue.

- New features are released!
a) Personalize app icon
b) Directly import photos from the camera roll into the PV application via the Share menu
c) Easily migrate all photos from the PV application to new devices, it won't consume network traffic
- You can select the displayed language directly in the settings of the application 
- Optimize the guide page flow for new users
- Improve the effect when importing photos: Go directly to the "Moments" folder when importing photos from the camera roll
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact photovault.info@gmail.com

3. Optimize the UI
4. Bug fixes and performance enhancement

- Support for swiping down on a photo to return to album view
- Support for viewing file details
- Change the album layout in the homepage to display more albums according to the customer feedback
- Support French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish
- Add "Upcoming Feature List" in Settings
- Fix some third-party cloud related bugs
- Fix sorting issues in the "Moments" folder
- Optimize the user interface

Any problem or suggestion please feel free to contact photovault.info@gmail.com

- Support for viewing file details

- Resolve the app freezing issue during launching the app
- Resolve the bug of not able to create folders on iOS 11 device
- Resolve some crash issues

PV 5.2.7 is released! Below new features are available:
==============
1. Break-in Alert:
- When someone enters an incorrect passcode, we snap a secret photo of the break-in person and log the time.
2. Dark mode:
- If you change your device appearance to Dark mode, PV Photo Vault app will also display in dark mode.
3. Fix bugs.

Any problem or suggestion, please feel free to contact photovault.info@gmail.com.

- Support Album Password feature:
Users can set an individual password for a separate photo album. It will also hide the cover image.
- Fix bugs and enhance usability.

Any problem or suggestion, please feel free to contact: photovault.info@gmail.com

- Instant switch between list view and grid view;
- Drag and drop to customize the file order;
- Support sorting by file name;
- Support file renaming;
- Bug fixes and UI improvements.
